column4: Hi. I would like to use the DSA key I generated with putty-keygen on Windows, but yet I can't.
I can use this key with putty in Ubuntu but not with just ssh in bash
If you open the key file with puttygen in windows, you can export it as a regular keyfile
yes, that's what I did, exported it to a "id_dsa" file, then back to Ubuntu copied it into ~/.ssh/
